name: .RUL File Extension
summary: Learn about .RUL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by InstallShield, a program used for creating Windows software installers; contains source code written in InstallScript, a proprietary language used for InstallShield projects; used for scripting custom installation functionality.

content: RUL files are named Setup.rul by default when you select File â†’ New Script File from an open InstallShield project. Subsequent RUL files use the name SetupN.rul, where N is an incrementing number.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
